description: A window opens on Manjaro Phosh on the Pinephone, but nothing else happens.

Pinephone Pro, Manjaro Phosh Beta 23

Scales to screen nicely
Supports UPS, USPS, and Russian Post.
Havent tested tracking yet but it looks promising.

It's weird that you'd need to auth w/ USPO when tracking is freely available without an account on tons of websites that track packages. You'd think that for tracking 1 package we wouldn't need to sign up and input that.
